item.title: shazamio: shazam on your terminal
item.description: I’ve switched to soundcloud for a while now after knowing spotify’s questionable business practices. Living with soundcloud made me realize one thing: most dj sets does not provide track list.

item.title: Python Hijinks - Permuting Params
item.description: Before we begin I must say this yet another “might not be best practices and not within standard of writing in python nor extendable to another language” ordeal.

item.title: ffmpeg - I Have No Admin Privilege and I Have To Transcode
item.description: A bit of background. A while ago I had to make a powerpoint slides with sets of video and audio sequence for certain event backdrop.

item.title: Jupyter - One-Liner pip Install
item.description: When working with jupyter notebook, you might come across the need to install external packages in your environment with your preferred package manager such as pip.

item.title: (Bit)Torrent as File Transfer Protocol
item.description: Before I begin I might need to address that: I do not endorse the act and practice of piracy. This post is intended to be personal documentation on alternative use of BitTorrent and BitTorrent protocol as a way to transfer file over network.

item.title: Ubuntu - Add Custom Package Vendors
item.description: Sometimes software vendors provides their own repository for specific releases. For instance qbittorrent latest releases might not be available on apt database, thus we can use their ppa as an alternative for latest stable releases under ppa:qbittorrent-team/qbittorrent-stable.

item.title: Win11 Debloat
item.description: I’ve been using windows for my workstation for a long time, mainly due to lots of software just refuse to work under VMs or wine and me being well too adjusted with windows environment.

item.title: powershell - Merge CSVs
item.description: Preface CSV is a tabular data exchange format and is used dangerously extensively by data scientists, engineers, or analyst alike.
